subject.description: Can be anything. Subject of the certification. It should match the registration metadata subject.

rootHash.description: blake2b-256 hash of the off-chain certification metadata linked in the metadata field.

metadata.description: Array of links that points to the metadata json file.

schemaVersion.description: Used to describe the json schema version of the on-chain metadata.

action.description: Describes the action this certification certificate is claiming. For the moment, CERTIFY shall be used to claim a certification that meets the Certification Standard. AUDIT shall be used to publish on-chain an audit that may not meet the Certification standard.

certificationLevel.description: Integer between 1 and 3 to describe the level of certification this certificate refers to when using a CERTIFY action. Integer of 0 for an audit when using an AUDIT action.
